message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $110. I think you'll really love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate it. I would like to counter with an offer of $95 for the product.
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can do $102.50 for the product. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $100 for the product.
I'm glad we're getting close, Bob. I can do $105 for the product. I think we're really close to a deal!
